title: JMIERR Men's Jeans Classic Regular Fit Straight Stretch Denim Pants
description: Durable & Stretchy Men’s Jeans for All-Day Comfort: Crafted from high-quality cotton denim with added stretch, these jeans offer durability and flexibility. Ideal for daily wear
Classic Straight-Leg Jeans with Timeless Style: Embrace a true classic with these jeans, offering a slimming yet relaxed fit at calves. Perfect for everyday comfort and style
Functional 5-Pocket Design in Men’s Pants: Featuring a timeless 5-pocket layout, these jeans combine practicality with style. Includes two side pockets, two back pockets, and a coin pocket
Premium Stretch Denim for Enhanced Flexibility: Designed with premium stretch fabric, these men’s jeans provide excellent elasticity for movement. Ideal for work or leisure
Easy-Care Men’s Denim Jeans: Machine washable and designed for easy care, these jeans maintain a classic straight-leg silhouette. An ideal gift for any man
